trans-unit.source: Watermark
Protect images by watermark.
Are you sure you want to delete your details?
trans-unit.target: Da li ste sigurni da želite da obrišete vaše detalje?

trans-unit.source: Watermark image must be uploaded for this module to work properly.
trans-unit.target: Vodeni žig slike mora biti postavljen na server da bi ovaj modul funkcionisao.

trans-unit.source: You have to enable the GD extension on your server to install this module
trans-unit.target: Morate omogućiti GD extenziju na vašem serveru da bi instalirali modul

trans-unit.source: Opacity required.
Opacity is not in allowed range.
Y-Align is required.
Y-Align is not in allowed range.
X-Align is required.
X-Align is not in allowed range.
At least one image type is required.
trans-unit.target: Najmanje jeda tip slka je neophodan.

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while uploading watermark: %1$s to %2$s
trans-unit.target: Došlo je do greške prilikom postavljanja vodenog žiga: %1$s na %2$s

trans-unit.source: Unable to add watermark section to the .htaccess file
trans-unit.target: Nije moguće dodati vodeni žig iz .htaccess fajla

trans-unit.source: Watermark image format is unsupported, allowed file types are: .gif, .jpg, .png
trans-unit.target: Format za vodeni žig nije odgovarajući, dozvoljeni foramati su: .gif, .jpg, .png

trans-unit.source: Once the module set up, regenerate your images with the dedicated tool in the Preferences section. Watermark will automatically be applied to new images.
trans-unit.target: Jednom kada se modul pdesi, regenerišite vaše slike sa posvećenim alatom. Vodeni žig će automatski biti primenjen na vaše slike.

trans-unit.source: Watermark file:
Watermark opacity (1-100)
Watermark X align:
Watermark Y align:
Choose image types for watermark protection:
trans-unit.target: Izaberite vrste slika koje biste da zaštitite:

trans-unit.source: Logged in customers can see images without watermark
trans-unit.target: Ulogovani kupci mogu videti slike bez vodenog žiga
